Communicate openly, honestly, and oftenJob SummaryWe are looking for an experienced Tech Licensing Sales Specialist to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for selling recruitment and tech licensing solutions to enterprise companies. You will work closely with clients to understand their business needs and develop customized solutions to meet those needs. ResponsibilitiesDevelop and maintain a pipeline of new business opportunities by conducting outbound calls and emails to potential clients
Meet with potential customers through regular physical and telephonic meetings, build relationships with clients, and understand their business needs
Conduct needs assessments and present recruitment and tech licensing solutions to clients
Negotiate and close sales deals
Build a strong pipeline and consistently meet and exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual sales quotas.
Increase Bayt.com's product portfolio sales per customer through active customer needs assessment and solution recommendations
Identify up-sell and cross-sell opportunities by building long-term relationships and providing quality customer service.
Lead online demonstrations to clients.
Provide professional after-sales support to enhance the client's success.  
Remain in frequent contact with the existing clients and prioritize retention as a major focus.  
Respond to complaints and resolve issues to ensure client success and satisfaction.
Maintain accurate records of all sales activities and follow-up tasks in the CRM system
Work collaboratively with the sales team and other departments to ensure customer satisfaction
Deliver service that is consistent with Bayt.com's values and customer promise.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or  Information Technology
3+ years of demonstrated track record of meeting/exceeding sales targets of B2B solutions
Work experience in SaaS industry would be an advantage

High aptitude for sales (Preferably B2B sales).
Strong networking and connections in Saudi Arabia.
Keen eye for identifying potential leads.
Excellent negotiation skills to convert qualified leads into customers.
Good interpersonal, communication, and presentation skills.
Highly energetic, self-starter with a purpose-driven, result-oriented attitude.
Empathy and ability to understand customer viewpoint and customer service.
Skilled at building rapport, opening doors, and understanding the business requirements of senior decision-makers.
If you are a motivated and results-driven sales professional with experience in SAAS or B2B business, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
